forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under the gentle embrace of sunshine, a momentary respite from the usual dance of fog that often graces the city. Presently, the temperature hovers around a comfortable 65 degrees—a pleasant warmth that may encourage a stroll along the Embarcadero or a leisurely visit to a rooftop café. The brisk west-southwest winds, whispering at 10 to 17 mph, add a refreshing note, bringing just enough chill to remind one that summer along the bay can be deceptive. Though the forecast hints at temperatures dipping slightly in the afternoon, this remains a day to relish; one can expect a gradual shift from brightness to the more familiar soft blanket of evening clouds.

As twilight approaches, the sky will wear a patchwork of mostly cloudy hues while the temperature settles to a balmy 56 degrees. A light jacket or a sweater would be wise as the evening air cools, particularly if you find yourself lingering outdoors. Ideal pursuits today involve simple pleasures: perhaps a light jog along the waterfront, finding a cozy spot in a nearby park to read, or indulging in a casual gathering with friends as the sun gradually bids adieu. The day beckons with opportunities for leisurely enjoyment, subtly balanced between warmth and the gentle touch of the bay's famous marine layer.
